name: Mogship
description:
You are the lone space adventurer venturing through the cosmos, but don’t be too gloomy! Your comfy spaceship is filled with cute cuddly creatures called Mogs! These little guys give you company and a reason to get up every cycle so make sure you look after them.

Oh no! The power generator has broken down and with that, your main way of growing food for everyone is in peril? Will you be able to survive whilst still looking after your crew of creatures?

The contents and themes of the narrative heavily parallel the real world climate crisis, conveying the need to strive for balance in society and how every outcome brings forth unique consequences.
